techmeme.title: Didi reports Q4 revenue up 7.1% YoY to ~$7.32B and a ~$180M net loss, down from a ~$6.2M profit in Q4 2023, as it recovers from China's $1.2B fine in July 2022 (Reuters)
Xiaomi reports Q4 revenue up 48.8% YoY to ~$15B, above ~$14.4B est., adjusted net profit up 69.4% YoY to ~$1.2B, above ~$884M est., boosted by smartphone sales (Reuters)
A look at Europe's options for building a "European Cloud", which is likely to be more difficult than the €15B Galileo satellite system, and potential issues (Bert Hubert's writings)
Ahead of its rumored March 19 release, a YouTuber posts a video of an alleged Pixel 9a, showing a flat rear panel, minimal camera bump, and large bezels (Rajesh Pandey/Android Police)
Anthropic Chief Product Officer Mike Krieger says the company is preparing enterprise features and discussing voice product launches with "a bunch of partners" (Cristina Criddle/Financial Times)
